item.title: Jonathan Groff Reveals How Viral Keanu Reeves Tony Awards Straddling Moment Came to Be
item.description: The Broadway actor got his ‘Matrix Resurrections’ co-star involved in his performance on the CBS telecast.

item.title: Sarah Jessica Parker, Jonathan Groff Gather Broadway Luminaries for Gala Luncheon
item.description: The gala luncheon commemorated 25 years of the New 42 rehearsal studio as well as its other programming for children and under-resourced families.
